name: Eden (itch) (Pablosko)
description:
Hi im Pablosko a video game developer. I'm actually working on Eden and this is the first playable Alpha version. 

In this game your objective is to get the highest floor (at the moment) defeating all the enemies through a dungeon. 

You will have the option to pick up 3 out of the 6 playable dashes and 5 accesories to complete your build and kill the slimes dashing through them. 

Slimes will get harder and diferent while you progress in the dungeon.

Give me some feedback about bugs and ideas.

I hope you guys enjoy it.
